title: Roganjosh Kashmiri
body:
The
siema

title: Nalli Gosht
body: A speciality of Lucknow, slow cooked lamb shanks in a delicate saffron curry.

title: Karahi Gosht
body: Lamb cooked with dry masala, ginger and green chillies.

title: Balouchi Raan
body: Grilled leg of baby lamb braised in a robust sauce with freshly ground spices.
